name: Crashlands (itch)
description:
This is a game that I made with my friend. It's not the most polished game but it is our first game. You are a dude that goes around shooting zombies. It is multiplayer so you can play with your friends. Well you actually need at least 2 people to play.  All you have to do is survive for 2 minutes and you win.

Use wasd to move.
